match3:
Name: Chroma Shift

Key Variation: Rotating Rows and Columns

Concept: In Chroma Shift, each move doesn’t just swap two adjacent tiles—players can rotate an entire row or column by one space. This rotation mechanic replaces the standard “swap” action.

Gameplay Impact:
You can align multiple potential matches in a single rotation, creating larger combos and chain reactions.
Strategically deciding which row or column to rotate becomes crucial, as you might trigger multiple matches across the board.

Outcome: Puts a new puzzle-like layer on top of Match 3 fundamentals, appealing to players who enjoy more controlled, strategic board manipulation.
